hooks.before:git: gh --version || (echo 'GitHub CLI not found. Install with: brew install gh' && exit 1)
hooks.after:bump: npx auto-changelog -p --commit-limit false --ignore-commit-pattern '^((dev|chore|ci):|Release)' && git add CHANGELOG.md
hooks.after:git:release: gh release create v${version} --title 'v${version}' --notes-file CHANGELOG.md || echo 'GitHub release creation failed, but git operations succeeded'
